titleStmt.title: Epictetus his manuall. And Cebes his table. Out of the Greeke originall, by Io: Healey
Manual. English
titleStmt.author: Epictetus.
Cebes, of Thebes, attributed name.
Healey, John, d. 1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by G. Eld] for E. Blunt and W. Barret,

notesStmt.note: A translation of "Enchiridion" by Epictetus, and the "Pinax" erroneously attributed to Cebes.
A variant of the 1610 edition with "Th. Thorpe" in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
